catches.Name: a Nice Pen
catches.Description:
It's a nice pen! Finally I can start my diary!
If I catch one...

catches.Name: a Rusty Coin
catches.Description:
Should I keep continue fishin' ?
Heads or tails.... oh both sides are blank.

catches.Name: a few Rusty Nails
catches.Description: Well, I'm happy it's not in the water anymore!

catches.Name: a Fishing Hook
catches.Description: It's better than stepping into it!

catches.Name: an Old Box
catches.Description:
I wonder what's inside of it? 
Maybe photos of a loved one or notes and plans...
I'll open it at home!

catches.Name: an Antique Pen
catches.Description: This looks like a really old one! How long could it be there? Who could lost it?
